subject: Replacement of Key Personnel in case of time extension under consultancy agreements of Authority Engineer/ Independent Engineer/ Supervision Consultant in consultancy contract agreements on the basis of RFPs issued prior to 10.11.2017.
text: HR <riy  TTHNf xifearrut 7419 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (s& 4ar7 a)TTHT 41T4) WaH / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 3-5 & 6, 74zz-10, ERa, # Rarit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Consultancy/2020 No. 10.2.22 datedIT March 2020 [Decision taken on the File No.NHAI/11013/AEGIE/ RFP Docu/2017 based on decision of EC in the meeting held on 09.12.2019 (Agenda Item 407.08)] Sub: Replacement of Personnel in case of time extension under consultancy agreements of Authority Engineer/ Independent Engineer/ Supervision Consultant in consultancy contract agreements on the basis of RFPs issued to 10.11.2017. Ref: Circular No. NHAI/11O13/IE,AE & SC/RFP Docu./2017 dated 10.11.2017 regarding modifications in RFP documents for engaging technical consultants. A number of representations were received from the consulting firms on the issue of reduction in remuneration of Personnel on replacements particularly when consultancy assignment is extended beyond originally stipulated consultancy period. The matter was examined and in ongoing consultancy works, finalised on the basis of RFPs issued prior to 10.11.2017 and involving extension beyond originally stipulated period, the following was decided: (i) In case of time extension for various reasons beyond the control of consultants including delays in land acquisition , relocation of utilities, slow progress, etc, the Consultants can propose one time replacement of each personnel without attracting any   penalty or reduction in remuneration, subject to approval of the Authority. (ii) Qualification & Experience of replacements shall be equal or better to the original personnel: However , any further replacement within the extended   period shall be  governed by the provisions in the consultancy contract: (iii) The above provisions shall be applicable in all consultancy (AE/IE/Supervision) contracts, which are ongoing on the date of issue of this circular based on '201 RIMIMI NHAL Key prior Key key key
